text: Pedro Manuel Araújo Mesquita (born 10 May 1970) is a Portuguese retired footballer who played as a right back, and the current assistant manager of UD Almería B. ==References== ==External links== * * Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Primeira Liga players Category:LigaPro players Category:Leixões S.C. players Category:Rio Ave F.C. players Category:Leça F.C. players Category:Gil Vicente F.C. players Category:Associação Naval 1º de Maio players Category:Portuguese football managers Category:Portuguese expatriate sportspeople in Spain
title: Pedro Mesquita
